work-item.field:
• Add following three new requirements and save the document
    • The user should be able to search for books
    • The user should be able to lend books
    • The user should be able to manage a book favorites list
  • Create following two sub requirements below the requirement search for books (Remember: Press [tab] button to indent Work Items)
    • Support of wildcards in search
    • It must be possible to search in all book fields
  • Create a new requirement Book Data and add following content as table
      
    • Author: string
    • Title: string
    • Cover image: jpg, gif
    • ISBN number: string
  • Add a caption Book data variables to your table
Hint:
  • You can use your TAB / Shift+TAB key to navigate through your tables.
  • To indent data you press Shift-Alt-Left/Right Arrow 
  • You can also copy and paste data using Alt+C / Alt+V
